document_data.name: Hardbread
document_data.mainbody: '''Hardbread''' was a type of [[bread]] that was eaten in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: It could be baked in the form of buns, rolls, or loaves, as well as thin-sliced [[cracker]]s.
document_data.Availability:
Hardbread was known to be eaten as a snack or part of a meal in the following settlements and establishments:
* The [[Lady Luck Tavern]] in [[Daggerford]], which served [[cheese]] on hardbread.
* [[The Way Inn]] on the [[Trade Way]], north of Daggerford, where they baked big oval-shaped loaves of hardbread. They toasted the stale leftovers for their [[bustard on buns]] dish.
* The [[Pleasing Platter]], a restaurant in [[Triboar]], usually in winter.
* [[The Wemic Comes to Westbridge]], a restaurant in [[Westbridge]], usually in winter.
* [[The Six Shields]], a rooming house in [[Ashabenford]], where a stay included two meals of hardbread, cheese, and [[milk]] each day. 
* The village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]], where farm-folk had hardbread spread with [[bloodlick]] for meals. For dessert, thin-sliced hardbread was toasted and spread with [[Brambleberry (berry)|brambleberry jelly]] or wild [[honey]] when it was available in summer.{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|21}}
* In the city of [[Uthmere]] in the [[Great Dale]], where vendors sold hardbread buns containing cold [[sausage]], smoked [[fish]], or [[cheese]] with local sauces for a midday meal, or "highbite".{{Cite web/Realmslore/Uthmere (Part Three): Daily and Nightly Life in Uthmere}}
document_data.History: When prepared [[Volothamp Geddarm]] for a visit to [[Barovia]] in the [[Domains of Dread]], [[Elminster]] gave him a pack of food including hardbread, as well as other supplies and [[vampire]]-fighting equipment.<ref>{{Cite dragon+/6/Travel Talk: Volo's Visit to Barovia}}
